HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: Walls and embrasures had some old definitions that made them behave different from other walls/embrasures. This would cause graphical issues when buildning next to rock-wall or if you built a double-wall. There were also some issues with floor-interaction. These issues should now be fixed.
This mod has been re-released for the new version of the game. This version will remain but will not be updated further.
